item.title: 特朗普推迟对欧盟征收 50%关税，美国股市反弹
item.description: 周二上午，美国股市反弹，原因是美国和欧盟之间的贸易紧张局势出现降温迹象，以及有迹象表明日本在债券溃败后可能准备调整债务发行，从而导致全球收益率下降。【原文：US equities rallied on Tuesday morning as trade tensions between the US and the European Union showed signs of cooling and as yields fell globally on hints Japan may be prepared to adjust debt issuance after a bond rout there.】

item.title: 风险投资家帕利哈皮蒂亚购买亚利桑那州房产股份，押注数据中心建设
item.description: 风险投资家查马特-帕利哈皮蒂亚（Chamath Palihapitiya）正在投资亚利桑那州的一宗土地交易，他押注该地块可用于建设数据中心，因为它有可能获得 1,500 兆瓦的电力。【原文：Venture capitalist Chamath Palihapitiya is investing in an Arizona land deal, betting that the site could be used for data centers given its potential access to 1,500 megawatts of power.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体将筹集 25 亿美元资金购买比特币
item.description: Truth Social 背后的 Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. 公司表示，它计划出售约 15 亿美元的股票和 10 亿美元的 0% 可转换票据，以购买比特币作为其资金。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp., the company behind Truth Social, said it plans to sell around $1.5 billion in stock and $1 billion in 0% convertible notes to buy Bitcoin for its treasury.】

item.title: 力拓铜矿因最高法院驳回阿帕奇人的上诉而得到推动
item.description: 美国最高法院为力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）建造北美最大的铜矿扫清了一大障碍，驳回了一个美国原住民组织的上诉，该组织称亚利桑那州的项目将破坏一个神圣的地区。【原文：The US Supreme Court cleared a major obstacle to Rio Tinto Plc’s construction of North America’s largest copper mine, rejecting an appeal by a Native American group that said the Arizona project will destroy a sacred area.】

item.title: 瓜子二手车认为人工智能开发支出增加将削弱利润率
item.description: 中国社交平台酷开科技（Kuaishou Technology）预计将在人工智能开发方面投入更多资金，以消除人们对其最新人工智能工具货币化乏力的担忧。【原文：Chinese social platform Kuaishou Technology expects to spend more on artificial intelligence development as it tries to dispel concerns about lackluster monetization of its latest AI tool.】

item.title: 非洲顶级服装零售商 Pepkor 的智能手机销量上升
item.description: 随着人们对在线金融服务的需求刺激了对预付费无线计划的渴望，Pepkor 控股有限公司作为南非最大的移动电话销售商的领先地位进一步扩大。【原文：Pepkor Holdings Ltd. has increased its lead as South Africa’s biggest seller of mobile phones, with demand for access to online financial services spurring appetite for pre-paid wireless plans.】

item.title: 据说 ABB 将选择博雅银行和瑞银集团进行潜在的机器人业务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，ABB 有限公司已选择美国银行（Bank of America Corp）和瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）为其机器人部门安排潜在交易。【原文：ABB Ltd. has selected Bank of America Corp. and UBS Group AG to arrange a potential deal for its robotics unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 办公室债券赌局出错，Lord Abbett 遭受 6000 万美元重创
item.description: Lord Abbett & Co.公司在堪萨斯城郊区一个办公园区的商业抵押贷款支持证券上遭受了 6000 多万美元的打击，因为相关贷款以大幅折扣出售。【原文：Lord Abbett & Co. was dealt a more than $60 million blow on a commercial mortgage-backed security tied to an office campus in suburban Kansas City, after the underlying loan was sold at a steep discount.】

item.title: 抵御关税冲击，非洲增长更强劲
item.description: 得益于对农业和能源基础设施的公共投资，非洲经济今年将加速增长，这有助于抵御全球贸易战的影响。【原文：African economic growth will accelerate this year, thanks to public investment in agriculture and energy infrastructure seen helping shield if from the global trade war.】

item.title: 3 月份美国房价涨势放缓，购房者减少
item.description: 由于挂牌房源攀升，但买家需求却没有相应增加，3 月份美国房价涨势放缓。【原文：Home-price gains in the US slowed in March as listings climbed without a corresponding uptick in buyer demand.】

item.title: 美国核心资本货物订单创 10 月以来最大降幅
item.description: 4 月份，美国工厂的商业设备订单创下 10 月份以来的最大降幅，表明在关税和税收政策不确定的情况下，投资意愿正在减弱。【原文：Orders placed with US factories for business equipment declined in April by the most since October, suggesting a diminishing appetite to invest amid uncertainty about tariffs and tax policy.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴考虑减持中通快递股份的方案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）正在考虑削减其在快递公司中通快递（开曼）有限公司（ZTO Express (Cayman) Inc.【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is considering options to pare down its minority stake in express delivery firm ZTO Express (Cayman) Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度重申季风雨提前到来后雨量充沛的预测
item.description: 印度维持其 4 月份的预测，即今年季风降雨量充足，这促使人们乐观地认为，世界上人口最多的国家的农民将有可能获得丰收。【原文：India maintained its April forecast of ample monsoon rains this year, spurring optimism that farmers in the world’s most populous nation will potentially harvest bumper crops.】

item.title: Salesforce 同意以 80 亿美元收购 Informatica
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 已同意以约 80 亿美元的价格收购 Informatica Inc.【原文：Salesforce Inc. has agreed to acquire Informatica Inc. for about $8 billion, barely a year after an earlier effort fell through.】

item.title: 巴西通胀低于所有预测值，令投资者大吃一惊
item.description: 5 月初，巴西的年度通胀率放缓，但仍远高于目标值，因为巴西央行强调其计划在更长时间内保持高利率以抑制价格压力。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation slowed down while remaining well above target in early May as the central bank hammers home its plans to keep its interest rate high for longer to tame price pressures.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行因环境问题将雪佛龙从美国投资组合中撤出
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞士国家银行出售了其在石油生产商雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：The Swiss National Bank sold its entire stake in oil producer Chevron Corp. because it now considers investments in the stock to breach its portfolio guidelines, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 匈牙利维持关键利率不变，重点关注锚定通胀率
item.description: 匈牙利央行一如预期维持利率不变，尽管总体物价数据不断改善，但经济仍在萎缩，决策者的工作重点是抑制仍然较高的通胀预期。【原文：Hungary’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged as expected, with policymakers focused on curbing still-high inflation expectations despite improving headline price data and a shrinking economy.】

item.title: 沙特体育基金 SURJ 支持皮克的七人制国王联赛
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将成为杰拉德-皮克（Gerard Piqué）的国王联赛（Kings League）的最新举办地，以利用其日益壮大的足球迷群体，提高年轻人的体育参与度。【原文：Saudi Arabia is to become the latest home of Gerard Piqué’s Kings League tournament, in a bid to capitalize on its growing football fan base and boost sports engagement among its youth.】

item.title: 全球支付公司 Worldpay 使用 Circle 提供稳定币支付服务
item.description: 支付处理公司 Worldpay 将允许美国和欧洲的客户使用 Circle Internet Financial 的 USDC 稳定币进行支付。【原文：Payments processing firm Worldpay will allow customers in the US and Europe to make disbursements with Circle Internet Financial’s USDC stablecoin.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Circle、股东在首次公开募股中寻求 6.24 亿美元投资
item.description: Circle Internet Group Inc.及其部分支持者正寻求在期待已久的首次公开募股中筹集高达 6.24 亿美元的资金，因为加密货币公司越来越多地利用公开市场筹集资金。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc. and some of its backers are seeking to raise up to $624 million in a long-awaited initial public offering, as crypto companies increasingly tap the public markets to raise funds.】

item.title: 在纽约建立管道需要的不仅仅是握手
item.description:
州长承诺与天然气行业和特朗普合作，但新的基础设施建设面临巨大障碍。【原文：

The governor pledged to work with the natural gas industry and Trump, but new infrastructure faces formidable obstacles.

】

item.title: 印度允许私营企业制造先进战斗机
item.description: 印度将首次允许私营企业设计和开发先进战机，同时加强国内国防生产，减少对进口的依赖。【原文：India will for the first time allow private firms to design and develop advanced warplanes, as it beefs up domestic defense production to reduce reliance on imports.】

item.title: Salesforce 接近以每股 25 美元的价格收购 Informatica
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Salesforce 公司正在就以约 80 亿美元（包括债务）收购 Informatica 公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Salesforce Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire Informatica Inc. for about $8 billion including debt, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 安瓦尔称文莱苏丹因疲劳在马来西亚住院治疗
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）在一次地区峰会闭幕式上告诉记者，文莱苏丹哈桑纳尔-博尔基亚（Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah）因疲劳过度于周二在吉隆坡住院。【原文：Brunei’s Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah was hospitalized in Kuala Lumpur on Tuesday due to fatigue, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim told reporters during the closing of a regional summit.】

item.title: 什么是勒索软件，它是如何发展壮大的？
item.description: 2021 年，在一次导致美国东海岸燃料供应瘫痪的网络攻击之后，时任总统乔-拜登发誓要将勒索软件作为国家安全的优先事项。为遏制勒索软件犯罪，美国通过了行政命令，召开了峰会，并发布了起诉书和制裁措施。四年后的今天，勒索软件仍然是全球企业和组织的眼中钉、肉中刺。零售商、制造商、医院和学校都是 2025 年迄今为止受到影响的对象。勒索软件【原文：In 2021, following a cyberattack that crippled fuel supplies along the US East Coast, then President Joe Biden vowed to make ransomware a national security priority. Executive orders were passed, summits were convened and indictments and sanctions were issued to try to curb the crimes. Four years later, ransomware remains a persistent thorn for businesses and organizations across the world. Retailers, manufacturers, hospitals and schools are among those impacted so far in 2025. item.title: 新加坡推动人工智能发展，开辟本地化模式之路
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，萨里塔-拉伊（Saritha Rai）从新加坡归来，为您带来该地区人工智能的最新进展。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Saritha Rai returns from a week in Singapore with word of the latest AI developments in the region.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在政策转向三年后接近 2% 的通胀目标
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们关注欧元区通胀前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at prospects for euro-zone inflation. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国为达成贸易协议展开六周冲刺
item.description: 在未来六周内，华盛顿和布鲁塞尔之间将举行一系列高风险会谈，此前双方已商定一个积极的时间表，以达成协议，避免跨大西洋贸易战。【原文：Over the next six weeks, a series of high-stakes talks are set to take place between Washington and Brussels after both sides agreed to an aggressive timeline to reach a deal that averts a transatlantic trade war.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告英国控制预算，否则将面临市场反弹风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）警告说，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）必须坚持其财政规则，控制支出，否则将面临市场反弹的风险，从而破坏政府的经济计划。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves must stick to her fiscal rules and keep spending under control or risk a market backlash that undermines the government’s economic plans, the International Monetary Fund warned.】

item.title: 硅数据公司首创人工智能芯片指数
item.description: 硅数据公司（Silicon Data）是一家专注于图形处理单元成本的市场情报公司，该公司创建了首个每日指数，用于跟踪对人工智能至关重要的专用芯片。【原文：Silicon Data, a market-intelligence firm that focuses on the cost of graphics processing units, created what it says is the first daily index to track the specialized chips vital to powering artificial intelligence.】
